org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs

Class EncFSFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs.EncFSFile

  • public class EncFSFile
extends Object
    Object representing a file in an EncFS volume.

    Useful for decryption of file names as well as performing file operations such as copying, moving, deletion etc.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int HEADER_SIZE
      Size in bytes of file header when file IV's are used (uniqueIV)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EncFSFile(EncFSVolume volume, EncFSFileInfo plainFileInfo, EncFSFileInfo cipherFileInfo)
      Create a new object representing a file in an EncFS volume

        public static final int HEADER_SIZE

    • Constructor Detail

      • EncFSFile

        public EncFSFile(EncFSVolume volume,
         EncFSFileInfo plainFileInfo,
         EncFSFileInfo cipherFileInfo)
        Create a new object representing a file in an EncFS volume
        Parameters:
        volume - The volume that contains the file
        plainFileInfo - EncFSFileInfo representing the cleartext file (decoded)
        cipherFileInfo - EncFSFileInfo representing the ciphertext file (encoded)

      • getParentPath

        public String getParentPath()
        Returns the volume path of the parent directory hosting this file

        This is the plaintext path starting from the volume's root up until the parent directory hosting the current file

        Returns:
        Volume path of this file's parent directory

      • openInputStream

        public EncFSInputStream openInputStream()
                                 throws EncFSCorruptDataException,
                                        EncFSUnsupportedException,
                                        IOException
        Opens the file as an EncFSInputStream that decodes the file contents automatically
        Returns:
        EncFSInputStream that decodes file contents
        Throws:
        EncFSCorruptDataException
        EncFSUnsupportedException
        IOException

      • openOutputStream

        public EncFSOutputStream openOutputStream(long inputLength)
                                   throws EncFSUnsupportedException,
                                          EncFSCorruptDataException,
                                          IOException
        Opens the file as an EncFSOutputStream that encrypts the file contents automatically
        Parameters:
        inputLength - Length of the input file that will be written to this output stream. Note that this parameter is optional if using EncFSLocalFileProvider, but some network based storage API's require knowing the file length in advance.
        Returns:
        EncFSOutputStream that encrypts file contents
        Throws:
        EncFSUnsupportedException
        EncFSCorruptDataException
        IOException

             throws IOException
        Copies this file/dir to a target file or directory
        Parameters:
        dstPath - EncFSFile representing the target file or directory
        Returns:
        true if copy succeeds, false otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException
